channel.title: DevHawk tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from DevHawk.

item.description:
One of Tony's castmates was wearing a Browncoats t shirt with "I aim to misbehave" on the back. I was thus inspired to watch Serenity.

The first 25 minutes of Serenity are stunning. The rest of the movie is great, but the opening is absolutely perfect.

https://t.co/3r6SAAY83Z

https://t.co/mXjNGvbH7U
item.source:markdown:
One of Tony's castmates was wearing a Browncoats t shirt with "I aim to misbehave" on the back. I was thus inspired to watch Serenity.
The first 25 minutes of Serenity are stunning. The rest of the movie is great, but the opening is absolutely perfect.

item.description:
SpongeBob the Musical is a truly ridiculous show. Regardless, Issaquah Kidstage is a fantastic production of this ridiculous show. So glad that Tony has been a part of it.

I am privileged that I often get to hear other people cheer for my kids. Patrick on ice, Tony on stage.
item.source:markdown:
SpongeBob the Musical is a truly ridiculous show. Regardless, Issaquah Kidstage is a fantastic production of this ridiculous show. So glad that Tony has been a part of it.
I am privileged that I often get to hear other people cheer for *my* kids. Patrick on ice, Tony on stage.

item.description: Opening night, Village Theatre Kidstage SummerStock production of SpongeBob SquarePants the Musical... Featuring my son #ProudDad https://t.co/2Ot1ZDKZms
